archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.2.6c: c) actions to take in unusual circumstances (e.g. if backups are not available, if all systems and services need to be restored or all technology has been compromised).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
